trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a collection of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension> objects associated with a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示的集合<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension>与证书关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: These extensions can provide additional information about the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 这些扩展可以提供有关证书的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> object to add to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象中的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> object to an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象添加到 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: The index at which the <paramref name="extension" /> parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 添加 <paramref name="extension" /> 参数的位置处的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection.Add%2A> method allows duplicate elements to be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection.Add%2A>方法使重复的元素，可以添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="extension" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="extension" /> 参数的值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: The location in the array at which copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 数组中开始复制的位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies a collection into an array starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的索引开始，将集合复制到数组。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is a zero-length string or contains an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 为零长度字符串或包含无效值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> specifies a value that is not in the range of the array.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 指定一个不在数组范围中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> objects in a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象中 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象的数目。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the number of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象中 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象的数目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回可循环访问 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator" /> object to use to iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator" /> 对象，用于循环访问 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators allow read-only access to data in the collection and cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器集合中允许只读访问数据和不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is guaranteed to be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示是否保证此集合是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is thread safe; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合是线程安全的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性派生自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口，并在重写以始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 有关此属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>属性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> object from a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象中的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The location of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取位于指定索引位置的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get information about an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension> object when you know the location of the object in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于获取其相关信息<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension>对象当你知道中的对象的位置时<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection>对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than the length of the array.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 等于或大于 array 的长度。

trans-unit.source: The object identifier (OID) of the extension to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的扩展的对象标识符 (OID)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> object whose value or friendly name is specified by an object identifier (OID).
trans-unit.target: 获取值或友好名称由对象标识符 (OID) 指定的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get information about an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension> object when you know the object identifier (OID) of the extension in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于获取其相关信息<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension>中的扩展的对象时知道对象标识符 (OID)<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that you can use to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象的访问。

trans-unit.source: An object that you can use to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象的访问。

trans-unit.source: This property implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此属性实现<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework classes based on <xref:System.Array> provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 类基于<xref:System.Array>提供其自己的同步的版本的集合使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Classes that use arrays can also implement their own synchronization using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用数组的类还可以实现自己的同步使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the collection, not directly on the collection.
trans-unit.target: 同步代码必须对集合的 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> 属性执行操作，而不是直接对集合执行操作。

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection.
trans-unit.target: 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时修改集合的其他线程。

trans-unit.source: Note that some implementations of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> might return the array itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，某些实现的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>可能会返回该数组本身。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: The location in the array at which copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 数组中开始复制的位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection into an array starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的索引开始，将集合复制到数组。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is a zero-length string or contains an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 为零长度字符串或包含无效值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> specifies a value that is not in the range of the array.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 指定一个不在数组范围中的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回可循环访问 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object to use to iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 对象，用于循环访问 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators allow read-only access to data in the collection and cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器集合中允许只读访问数据和不能用于修改基础集合。
